title: 1.7.2开服后用非正版MC登录不进去，好像是说非正版的原因
txt_content: 本人用multicraft开了1.7.2pc服，自己进去时客户端显示Failed to Login : Invalid session (Try restarting your game求解~在线等待QQ 2749643747

replies.author: mcbbs2517494595
replies.txt_content:
打开server.properties 找到 online-mode=true改成falsefile

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 打开server.properties 找到 online-mode=true改成false
改了之后服务端显示  无法开服Failed to adapt server configuration

replies.txt_content: 请不要使用记事本。目测你配置多删了几字

replies.txt_content: 你用的什么启动器啊 启动器上面有正版非正版登陆选项
